skills.name: React Component Generator
skills.description: Generate React components following best practices with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and Zustand state management.

skills.name: Feature Builder
skills.description: Build complete React features with proper layered architecture including UI components, business logic, API integration, and state management.

skills.name: Frontend Code Review
skills.description: Frontend-focused code review for React/TypeScript/Tailwind projects. Analyzes code quality, security, performance, accessibility, and best practices.

skills.name: UI Analyzer
skills.description: Analyze UI design screenshots and generate React components with TypeScript and Tailwind CSS.

skills.name: Figma UI Analyzer
skills.description: 专业的 Figma 设计稿分析工具，通过 Figma MCP 获取设计信息，提供详细的 UI 还原开发思路和实现方案。

skills.name: Request Analyzer
skills.description: Proactively analyze user requests to determine task type, assess prompt quality, and intelligently recommend which skills to activate.

skills.name: Prompt Optimizer
skills.description: Analyze and optimize user prompts for clarity, specificity, and completeness using interactive questionnaires or direct analysis.

skills.name: Skill Creator
skills.description: Guide for creating effective skills that extend Claude's capabilities with specialized knowledge, workflows, or tool integrations.

skills.name: Git Helper
skills.description: 智能 Git 操作助手，自动处理代码提交、生成符合 Conventional Commits 规范的 commit message。

skills.name: Product Manager
skills.description: 资深产品经理助手，提供专业的PRD文档评审和创作服务。涵盖需求分析、用户价值、技术可行性、商业目标等多个维度。

skills.name: Tech Article Writer
skills.description: 技术干货文章创作专家，擅长用简练语言传递核心知识点，不遗漏关键信息。

skills.name: WeChat Article Writer
skills.description: 专业的微信公众号文章创作助手。支持通过搜索工具丰富内容、优化标题、调整语气为官方文案风格。

skills.name: Markdown to WeChat
skills.description: 将 Markdown 文档转换为适合微信公众号的美观 HTML 格式。支持标题、代码块、引用块、列表、表格等常见元素。

skills.name: WeChat Markdown Formatter
skills.description: 微信公众号 Markdown 智能排版专家。将各种格式的文本内容优化为适合公众号阅读的 Markdown 格式。

skills.name: X Article Fetcher
skills.description: 从 X (Twitter) 获取文章内容的专业工具。使用 Playwright MCP 自动访问 X 文章链接，提取完整内容。

skills.name: English to Chinese Translator
skills.description: 专业的英文到中文翻译工具，支持技术文档、学术论文、新闻文章等多种内容类型，自动识别并应用相应翻译风格，完整保留 Markdown 格式和代码块。

skills.name: X to WeChat Agent
skills.description: 轻量级launcher，启动独立subagent将X文章转换为公众号文章。不占用主agent上下文，自动完成爬取、翻译、排版、HTML生成全流程。
